title: Excavation Permit
name: Excavation Permit
description: Permit for excavation work, ensuring all underground hazards and safety measures are addressed.

sections.title: PRE-WORK HAZARD ASSESSMENT
items: Underground services (gas, electric, water, telecom) located and marked
Ground conditions assessed (stability, contamination, flooding risk)
Adjacent structures inspected for potential impact
Weather conditions checked (rain, freezing, high winds)
Emergency access and egress routes established

sections.title: SAFETY CONTROLS & PROTECTION
items: Excavation edges protected with barriers/fencing
Shoring or benching installed as per depth requirements
Ladder access provided (max 7.5m spacing)
Spoil heaps placed minimum 1.5m from excavation edge
Traffic management and signage in place
Competent person assigned to supervise excavation

sections.title: PPE & EQUIPMENT REQUIREMENTS
items: Hard hats, high-visibility clothing, safety boots mandatory
Hearing protection if mechanical excavation
Respiratory protection if contaminated ground
Fall protection if depth exceeds 2m
Gas detection equipment if required
First aid kit and emergency equipment available

sections.title: MONITORING & INSPECTION
items: Daily inspection before work starts
Atmospheric monitoring if confined space risk
Continuous monitoring during mechanical excavation
Re-inspection after weather events or ground movement

sections.title: COMPLETION & REINSTATEMENT
items: Excavation backfilled and compacted to specification
Services reinstated and tested
Surface reinstated to original condition
Area inspected and signed off
Permit closed and filed
